title: Industrial Organization
description: This course examines modern theories of the firm, market power, and competitive strategy.  Game theory is employed throughout the course.

prerequisites: ECON 6100 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ECON 6106 Graduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
